DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Levetiracetam Versus Placebo Levodopa-induced Dyskinesias Advanced Parkinson 's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: The LeLeDys study design determine efficacy safety levetiracetam levodopa-induced dyskinesia advance Parkinson 's disease . The design multicenter , randomize , stratify , double-blinded , placebo-controlled phase IV study design . The hypothesis levetiracetam able reduce duration severity levodopa-induced dyskinesia Parkinson 's disease . The patient plan treat levetiracetam ( 2000 mg per day ) placebo 13 week . Efficacy measure modify AIMS . Main inclusion criterion : - Advanced Parkinson 's disease ( Hoehn & Yahr II-IV ) - Age 30 80 year - Levodopa-induced dyskinesia least 25 % wake day moderate disability - Stable dosage antiparkinson medication and/or stable deep brain stimulation parameter least 4 week prior inclusion - Written inform consent Main exclusion criterion : - Atypical parkinsonian syndrome - Treatment antipsychotic - Epilepsia seizure history - Deep brain stimulation DBS STN - Pregnant lactate woman - Severe dementia Methods : - Primary outcome measure modify AIMS - Secondary outcome measure include UPDRS , safety , patient day record Study medication : - Levetiracetam ( upt 2000 mg / day ) - Matched Placebo
